channel.title: Classificaiton on Shahed Anzarus Sabab
channel.description: Recent content in Classificaiton on Shahed Anzarus Sabab

item.title: Hotel Review Sentiment Analysis - Tf-Idf, Logistic Regression, RoBERTa
item.description: This project aims to classify ratings of the hotel reviews. There are 5 ratings (i.e., class) in the dataset along with the reviews. The dataset is quite balanced among the 5 classes. The objective is to develop two different classification models i.e., a baseline and a state of the art(SOTA) model to compare the performance of classifying ratings. To uncover interesting insights from the data, different exploratory analysis have been performed.
